source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery shot captures the point-of-view from a vehicle moving through a brightly lit tunnel. The camera is angled upwards, looking through a windshield dotted with raindrops. The lights lining the curved walls of the tunnel create a sense of continuous motion as the vehicle passes through.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This scenery shot captures the point-of-view from a vehicle moving through a brightly lit tunnel. The camera is angled upwards, looking through a windshield dotted with raindrops. The lights lining the curved walls of the tunnel create a sense of continuous motion as the vehicle passes through.
